item.title: Publications
item.description: Journal Publications Freunberger, D., Bylund, E., & Abrahamsson, N. (in press). Is it time to reconsider the ‘gold standard’ paradigm in ERP studies on grammatical processing in a second language? A critical assessment based on qualitative individual differences. To appear Applied Linguistics. Freunberger, D., & Roehm, D. (2017). The costs of being certain: Brain potential evidence for linguistic pre-activation in sentence processing. Psychophysiology, 54, 824–832. Freunberger, D.
